trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the FormViewDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe FormViewDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de esquemas para exibição de formatação de **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>propriedade retorna uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os modelos de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FormViewDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe FormViewDesigner fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the data source for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> changes.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método é chamado quando o esquema da fonte de dados associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>alterações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação de designer para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of automatic formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de automático formatação esquemas para exibição no **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>objeto é preenchido com um membro codificados em XML de uma classe interna</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If an item template has been defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the GetDesignTimeHtml method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> collection of the control to an empty <xref:System.String> array if the schema for the data source cannot be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Se um modelo de item tiver sido definido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controlar os conjuntos de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>coleção do controle para vazio <xref:System.String>matriz se o esquema da fonte de dados não pode ser obtido.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>objeto para forçar uma chamada para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml then calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: O GetDesignTimeHtml, em seguida, chama o método base para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: If no item template has been defined for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the GetDesignTimeHtml calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate markup that renders to a placeholder.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum modelo de item tiver sido definido para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controlar as chamadas GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>método para gerar a marcação que renderiza a um espaço reservado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> em tempo de design.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto de marcação que é usado para renderizar um espaço reservado para o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control does not include one of the item templates, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method calls the GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml method, which generates the markup for a placeholder that contains instructions on how to edit template content and a message that an item template is required.
trans-unit.target: Se a marcação para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle não tem um dos modelos de item, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método chama o método GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml, que gera a marcação para um espaço reservado que contém instruções sobre como editar o conteúdo do modelo e uma mensagem de que um modelo de item é necessário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o texto de marcação que renderiza a um espaço reservado na superfície de design.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização e seus métodos base configurem propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando as alterações de esquema da fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o designer está no modelo de edição modo ou um campo está sendo adicionado ou editado, chamadas de método OnSchemaRefreshed o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>método, que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle para refletir a alteração da fonte de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes properties in the properties grid in a design host at design time, or provides new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona ou remove propriedades na grade de propriedades em um host de design em tempo de design ou fornece novas propriedades de tempo de design que podem corresponder às propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The properties for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades para a classe do componente.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner"></xref> control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner"> </xref> controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner> control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar a regra de estilo embutido na marcação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.FormViewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você pode remover o contêiner de tabela externa definindo essa propriedade como `true`.

trans-unit.source: This provides flexibility in applying CSS style rules in the control markup.
trans-unit.target: Isso proporciona flexibilidade na aplicação de regras de estilo CSS na marcação do controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O padrão é<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linhas de amostra para o controle associado exibir.

trans-unit.source: The SampleRowCount always returns `2`.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna o SampleRowCount `2`.

trans-unit.source: This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control at design time, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A> mode is numeric.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que dois links de página a ser exibida na linha do pager a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controlar em tempo de design, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A>modo é numérico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerSettings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The number of sample rows.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas de amostra.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos para os campos do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property constructs a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects, one for each control template in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups constrói uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objetos, um para cada modelo de controle associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The control templates are the header, footer, pager, item, edit item, insert item, and empty data.
trans-unit.target: Os modelos de controle são o cabeçalho, rodapé, pager, item, editar item, item de inserção e dados vazios.

trans-unit.source: The control template <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements contain a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de controle <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>elementos contêm uma única <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each templated field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> que contém um elemento para cada campo modelo de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always true, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Como a propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre verdadeira, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle que contém uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle não afeta qualquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
